alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Dubuque; Jackson; Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 15 at 9:37PM CST until December 15 at 11:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CST FOR ROCK ISLAND...WESTERN JO DAVIESS...JACKSON...SCOTT...CENTRAL DUBUQUE AND CLINTON COUNTIES... At 935 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Platteville to near Hamlet, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Davenport, Dubuque, Moline, Rock Island, Bettendorf, Clinton, East Moline, Maquoketa, Galena, Durant, Silvis, Eldridge, DeWitt, Milan, Colona, Camanche, Asbury, Le Claire, Coal Valley and Savanna. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for northwestern Illinois...and northeastern and east central Iowa.
